snippet: Boston lead the best-of-seven Eastern Conference quarterfinal series, two games to one, after a 5-2 on Monday in Toronto. Success in the face-off circle has been key, as it has all season for the Bruins.
abstract: Boston lead the best-of-seven Eastern Conference quarterfinal series, two games to one, after a 5-2 on Monday in Toronto. Success in the face-off circle has been key, as it has all season for the Bruins.

headline.main: Face-off Circle Is Focal Point of Leafs-Bruins Series
